name: Purple Piano Tiles - Tap Purple Color Piano Tile and Avoid White Tiles
name_original: Purple Piano Tiles - Tap Purple Color Piano Tile and Avoid White Tiles
description:
here We launches the new game with the latest purple color theme.piano tiles game is used to tap the purple piano instead of tapping the white tile.


the game is simple and interesting with the more fun.try to tap the purple tile as fast as you can and enjoy the tune of piano.

there are mainly three level of the piano.

* Classic
* Arcade
* Time
* Alert


- Classic Mode used To tap The piano tiles of Purple color as fast as you can. remember to not to touch the white tile.

- Arcade mode not allowes you to let any Purple tile untapped.Try to manage all Purple tiles.

- Time mode is used to tap maximum Purple square tiles in a limited time 10 seconds. with unlimited fun.

- Alert mode has some obstacles and you have to be alert to don’t tap the red piano tiles.


Features


- 4 Fantastic levels.
- heart touching music.
- wettest design theme
- best piano game in the year
